name: Up Down Giraffe
description:
Up Down Giraffe

Up Down Giraffe is a simple platformer game with fun movement mechanics, nice handmade sprites and interesting worlds to explore!

The game may seem easy at first, but the difficulty level increases as the game continues.  The movement combined with the level design creates an exciting environment that is also suitable for speedrunning!

Controls

A and D - move left and right

Space - jump

R - restart the level

P - restart the whole game

Have fun!
